text: Two-Gun Caballero is a 1931 American western film directed by Jack Nelson and starring Robert Frazer, Consuelo Dawn and Carmen Laroux.Pitts p.182 ==Cast== * Robert Frazer as Bob Blake - posing as Lopez * Consuelo Dawn as Sally Thompson * Carmen Laroux as Rosita - Lopez's Sweetheart * Bobby Nelson as Jimmy Thompson * Jack Perrin as Sheriff * Pat Harmon as Butch Devlin * Diane Esmonds as Mrs. Steele * Al Ferguson as Burke ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michael R. Pitts. Poverty Row Studios, 1929–1940: An Illustrated History of 55 Independent Film Companies, with a Filmography for Each. McFarland & Company, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1931 films Category:1931 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Jack Nelson
title: Two-Gun Caballero
